name: bot-fin-site
description: Sistema de controle financeiro com bot conversacional e painel web

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --workspace=backend && npm install --workspace=frontend && npm install --workspace=shared
scripts.build:backend: npm run build:shared && npm run build --workspace=backend
scripts.build:frontend: npm run build:shared && npm run build --workspace=frontend
scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.format: npm run format:backend && npm run format:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
